overview: Valant provides a web-based Electronic Medical Record (EMR/EHR) system to psychiatrists and other Behavioral Health professionals. Valant’s comprehensive EMR provides clinical documentation, scheduling, e-prescribing, billing, lab integrations, support, Meaningful Use certification and a mobile application. This secure, web-based software frees up your valuable time so you can spend it seeing patients and earning more revenue. Valant’s EMR is the only EMR designed and developed by a practicing psychiatrist.
